comment.body:
I don't have an iPhone, but on my end this notice is automatically closed after about 1-2 seconds.
Maybe we can remove old exception rule:
```adblock
@@||usercentrics.eu^$domain=justwatch.com
```

As I recall it was added due to some breakage, though I don't remember what was the reason exactly.
Currently I don't see any problems if I block it by using this rule:
```adblock
||usercentrics.eu^$domain=justwatch.com,important
```
